Click on the extensions button in Visual Studio Code to open the extensions sidebar.
Type 'Open In Browser' in the extensions search bar to find the extension.
Click on the first 'Open In Browser' extension in the list to select it.
Click the install button to install the selected 'Open In Browser' extension.
Click on 'File' in the top menu to open the file menu options.
Select 'Open Folder' from the file menu to open the file explorer.
Navigate to the desktop in the file dialog and create a new folder named 'Website'.
Select the 'Website' folder to open it in Visual Studio Code.
Create a new HTML file and name it 'home.html' within the 'Website' folder.
Press the exclamation mark key followed by Enter to generate the HTML template.
Replace the title in the HTML template with 'My Website'.
Type 'Welcome to my website' inside the body of the HTML template.
Right-click the 'home.html' file and select 'Open In Default Browser' to view it in the browser.
